text.tspan: humbuger Hunter
You are 海綿寶寶，your boss 蟹老闆 is very
angry and you are very hungry because
of the lost of humbugers. You need to get
all your humbugers back in order to be a
burger king！Prove yourself! You are a hero!
Since there are green monsters, you need
to either kill them to earn scores or avoid
touching them! Remember you have only
120 seconds to collect all the humbugers.
In order to protect yourself from the
monsters, your boss has given you a gun.
START
Game
Rule
move 海綿寶寶(yellow object) : w - jump , a - left, d - right, h - shoot. you have only 8 bullets
BECAREFUL OF Black platform : when you stand on it for a while, it will disappear.
BECAREFUL OF Red platform : it will move vertically. if you are under the vertical platform,
with the same x coordinate, you will stand on the platform automatically once the vertical
platform collides with you.
Blue portal : once you move left(click a) at the position of left top corner portal you will
be transmitted to the right bottom portal. Once you move right(click d) at the position of right bottom
portal, you will be transported to the left top corner.
How to win ?
Collect all the bugers and go to exit point(door like object) within 120 seconds.
How to lose?
Do not collide with green monster or shot by them
unless you want to lose. Or you wait until 120 seconds...
Score:
There are two levels of difficulties, once you win a level, L * 100 points will be added where L = level.
if you are brave enough, you can hunt monsters by shooting them. Every monsters worth 8 points.
if you have collected one humbuger, 10 points will be added
Each of your remaining seconds worth 1 point, after passing one level.
WHY YOU NEED SCORES?
TO SHOW OFF. Once you click start game, a message box will be pop out, enter your id!
scores with your id wil be displayed at the end of the game. PROVE THAT YOU ARE THE BEST!
Student id:
Name:
Liu Pak Wai
